summary: Confirm artifact locations and provide provenance for telemetry exports.

directives.details: Provide paths to export_schema.md, composite_export.json and composite_export.csv; attach or publish build_info.json and SHA256 checksums for export artifacts; optionally include a 10-row sample for ingestion testing.
checklist: Provide SHA256 checksums for all export artifacts
Optional: 10-row sample excerpt for consumer validation
acceptance_criteria: All referenced paths resolve in toyfoundry_ai_0 repo
build_info.json present alongside exports and populated
